In order to seek this wisdom-eye, they seek the supreme wisdom among wisdoms that can be used to know all dharmas as they are, and also cannot be attained. This wisdom that can be used to cause all sentient beings to abide in this wisdom, namely the wisdom of not abiding in any dharmas, is the reason they come to this place.

From the realm of sentient beings, there are distinctions in names. When observing the Dharma realm and the realm of sentient beings, they do not see these distinctions. This is the path of the non-attainability of sentient beings and the path of the wisdom of the equality of sentient beings.
